_source.text: After its most successful year to date, F&E is already working with the UAE Ministry of Education to ensure GESS and GEF 2012 is bigger and better than ever.

_source.text: Adopting the slogan 'Prevention is better than cure', this Ministry of Health poster attempts to persuade people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
